trans-unit.source: Drive manifests can be automatically backed up to blobs by setting the <languageKeyword>BackupDriveManifest</languageKeyword> property to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> in the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> or <link xlink:href="6f83d480-c09e-4e3b-b096-46e140e8c93d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Job Properties</link> operations.
trans-unit.target: Drive manifests can be automatically backed up to blobs by setting the <languageKeyword>BackupDriveManifest</languageKeyword> property to <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> in the <link xlink:href="2f703ff1-d52b-43bd-81ec-90350a39e2af" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Put Job</link> or <link xlink:href="6f83d480-c09e-4e3b-b096-46e140e8c93d" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Update Job Properties</link> operations.

trans-unit.source: By default the drive manifests are not backed up.
trans-unit.target: By default the drive manifests are not backed up.

trans-unit.source: The drive manifest backups are stored as block blobs in a container within the storage account associated with the job.
trans-unit.target: The drive manifest backups are stored as block blobs in a container within the storage account associated with the job.

trans-unit.source: By default, the container name is <languageKeyword>waimportexport</languageKeyword>, but you can specify a different name in the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> property when calling the <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>Update Job Properties</languageKeyword> operations.
trans-unit.target: By default, the container name is <languageKeyword>waimportexport</languageKeyword>, but you can specify a different name in the <languageKeyword>ImportExportStatesPath</languageKeyword> property when calling the <languageKeyword>Put Job</languageKeyword> or <languageKeyword>Update Job Properties</languageKeyword> operations.

trans-unit.source: The backup manifest blob are named in the following format: <codeInline>waies/jobname_driveid_timestamp_manifest.xml</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The backup manifest blob are named in the following format: <codeInline>waies/jobname_driveid_timestamp_manifest.xml</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: You can retrieve the URI of the backup drive manifests for a job by calling the <link xlink:href="1d416186-c5a7-423c-9a24-bad4f7b89828" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Job</link> operation.
trans-unit.target: You can retrieve the URI of the backup drive manifests for a job by calling the <link xlink:href="1d416186-c5a7-423c-9a24-bad4f7b89828" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Get Job</link> operation.

trans-unit.source: The blob URI is returned in the <languageKeyword>ManifestUri</languageKeyword> property for each drive.
trans-unit.target: The blob URI is returned in the <languageKeyword>ManifestUri</languageKeyword> property for each drive.
